pullrequest.title: Converter: add `<map>` element for converting fixed values

content.raw:
Yeah, the syntax is different than the `Move` operator and inspired by XPath, probably because I spent some time making an xslt for converting the `//axis/use_parent_model_frame` to `//axis/xyz/@expressed_in`. It was easier for me to implement this function using XPath syntax, and it is different, but we invented all the converter syntax anyway, so I thought we could experiment with a different approach.

If we decide to change it, it will take a few hours because we'll have to change the tests in addition to the code.
